column5: Hey, Anyone been to Rays this year? We booked a cabin a number of months back for a stay coming up in a couple of weeks. I am trying to get in touch with them but the facebook user I was talking with(yes we spoke mostly on facebook) has been disabled or banned me for some reason. I tried to call the number on their website and it says I cannot be connected. Just hoping it is nothing and I have emailed them but I am a bit concerned... Curious if anyone has been recently.
nevermind, all good. I figured it out and don't see a way to delete this thread myself. Thanks
